column4: do i need nVidia framebuffer support if i have nforce2 with nvidia's gf4 and i want to use nvidia's drivers
no, you absolutely don't, I think it might even cause problems
that's what i thought too, because it whined about that yesterday. but i didn't even get X running so it made me think for a second
so, i don't need to compile "support for frame buffer devices" into my kernel, right?
